text: Owen Smith (born 2 May 1970) is a British Labour Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament for Pontypridd in Wales since 2010. In July 2015 he challenged Jeremy Corbyn for the leadership of the Labour Party.Owen Smith announces Labour leadership challenge. ITV News, 13 July 2016 Before he became an MP he worked for the BBC and as a lobbyist for Pfizer,Owen Smith on the Iraq War, working as a lobbyist and the private sector's role in the NHS, Wales Online, 10 May 2006 a company that makes drugs or pharmaceuticals. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs category:Lobbyists Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:Politicians from Lancashire
title: Owen Smith
